Feel free to give us a call if you want more information about any of our services

[/et_pb_fullwidth_header][/et_pb_section][et_pb_section fb_built=”1″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_row custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” width=”65%” width_tablet=”” width_phone=”90%” width_last_edited=”on|phone” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”||0%||false|false” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”4_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text module_class=”titleGreen” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” header_font=”|700|||||||” header_text_color=”#000000″ header_font_size=”50px” header_2_font=”|700|||||||” header_2_text_align=”center” header_2_font_size=”50px” custom_margin=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding_tablet=”” custom_padding_phone=”||0px||false|false” custom_padding_last_edited=”on|phone” header_2_font_size_tablet=”” header_2_font_size_phone=”40px” header_2_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Lawn Maintenance Services in Minneapolis and Twin Cities

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][/et_pb_row][et_pb_row column_structure=”3_5,2_5″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_column type=”3_5″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|300|||||||” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.9em” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Obtaining a glorious lawn, maintaining it, trimming the edges, bagging clippings, pulling weeds and eliminating pests is an ongoing job that most people don’t have the time to worry about. Thankfully, by letting us take care of your yard from start to finish, you can enjoy your lawn without breaking a sweat at all this season.

We’ll take care of your lawn health by lawn aerating, overseeding, sodding, fertilizing – whatever it takes to get the look and feel of the lawn you’ve always imagined.

If having a garden in your backyard has always been a dream of yours, give us a call and we’ll plan a strategy together to make it a reality. Whether you just want us to get it started, or maintain it throughout the season, we can make it happen.

[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”2_5″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][dsm_text_divider header=”Free Quote” divider_style=”dotted” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” header_level=”h2″ header_font=”Raleway|700||on|||||” header_text_color=”#068fd7″ header_font_size=”32px” text_shadow_style=”preset1″ text_shadow_color=”rgba(0,0,0,0)” global_colors_info=”{}”][/dsm_text_divider][et_pb_contact_form use_spam_service=”on” recaptcha_list=”worryFree|worryFree-0″ email=”worryfreelawn@comcast.net,scott@levelupwebservices.com” custom_message=”Get a free quote – Lawn Maintenance page||et_pb_line_break_holder||||et_pb_line_break_holder||Name: %%name%%||et_pb_line_break_holder||Email: %%Email%%||et_pb_line_break_holder||Phone: %%Phone%%||et_pb_line_break_holder||Address: %%Address%%||et_pb_line_break_holder||City: %%City%%||et_pb_line_break_holder||Service i am interested in: %%services%%||et_pb_line_break_holder||Comments: %%name%%” success_message=”Thanks for your inquiry. CALL WORRY FREE LAWN CARE TODAY

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|||on|||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” text_font_size=”24px” text_orientation=”center” background_layout=”dark” custom_margin=”||41px|||” text_font_size_tablet=”” text_font_size_phone=”20px” text_font_size_last_edited=”on|phone” text_line_height_tablet=”” text_line_height_phone=”1.4em” text_line_height_last_edited=”on|phone” global_colors_info=”{}”]

We can also take care of light tree trimming, hedge trimming, and more.
Free estimate on how we can keep your lawn and garden healthy year round.

Find Us On The Web[/et_pb_text][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_2″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_image src=”https://worryfreelawnmn.com/wp-content/uploads/2020/11/worryfreelogo.png” title_text=”worryfreelogo” align=”center” force_fullwidth=”on” _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][/et_pb_image][/et_pb_column][et_pb_column type=”1_4″ _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” global_colors_info=”{}”][et_pb_text _builder_version=”4.16″ _module_preset=”default” text_font=”|300|||||||” text_text_color=”#ffffff” text_font_size=”16px” text_line_height=”1.5em” text_orientation=”center” global_colors_info=”{}”]

Minneapolis, St Paul, Bloomington, Columbia Heights, Inver Grove Heights, Maplewood, Mendota Heights, New Brighton, ​and Richfield
